law.catch_line: In this Part IV the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this Part IV the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Community supported living arrangements services" means services to assist an individual with developmental disabilities in activities of daily living necessary to permit the individual to live in the individual's own home, apartment, family home, or rental unit with no more than 2 other individuals who are recipients of these services.

text.section:
"Eligible individual" means an individual who:
Has a developmental disability as defined in § 7-101(e) of this title; or
Is eligible only for individual support services, as provided in § 7-403(c) of this title.
"Program" means the Community Supported Living Arrangements Services Program.
"Support services" means individual support services and family support services as defined in this title.
